# init(scope:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new map pitch slider with the scope you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init(scope: Namespace.ID? = nil)
```

## Parameters

- **scope**: A [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/Namespace/ID] value that identifies this namespace and that you use to associate this control with a map instance.
title: init(scope:)
